channel.title: Need someone to TEAMVIEW or SKYPE with me
channel.description:
Hello, can someone TeamView or Skype me? I have my RSPS set up (317 Delta), but for some reason people get an error message saying "Sorry, loading char profile." I am led to believe that this is a problem within the client.java file because I PORT FORWARDED CORRECTLY, AND HAVE A NO-IP SETTUP. Please no comments on "OH just setup a No-Ip or you didn't Port Forward correctly." Because I did..
So, thanks to anyone who helps :)
Skype - Pedobearsson - Max Bulgatz TeamViewer - PM ME FOR INFO
THANKS ALL!

item.title: Need someone to TEAMVIEW or SKYPE with me
item.dc:creator: @geck75 geck75
item.description:
@geck75 wrote:

I have a returncode list.txt file and #21 says - You have only just left another world.

Read full topic

OK FOUND SOMETHING OUT. So i did a test and didn’t run the server, i just opened it to see what error message i would get if i tried to log in, and i got the same thing

“Sorry, loading char profile”

Here is what i did though…

@zyle1992 wrote:

if(k == 5)
{
aString1266 = “@whi@Sorry, loading char profile.”;
aString1267 = “@whi@Try logging in again.”;

And then

if(k == 5)
{aString1266 = “@whi@Your account is already logged in.”;
aString1267 = “@whi@Try again in 60 secs…”; [/quote]

Yes, replacing the existing strings with the correct ones should tell you where exactly the problem lies.

item.title: Need someone to TEAMVIEW or SKYPE with me
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

geck75:

So what do i look for then?

Well, you could either replace what you posted with the correct values (found in a 317 deob), or you can search through your server, and find where the login response codes are 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, or 12, and see which one of them is actually preventing the player from loggin in.

item.title: Need someone to TEAMVIEW or SKYPE with me
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

All of those numbers, the

if(k == 11) {
    aString1266 = "@whi@Sorry, loading char profile.";
    aString1267 = "@whi@Try logging in again.";
    return;
}

Is used by the client to tell you why you can’t connect. The problem here is that most of them us the same thing, which means that it tells us nothing.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to TEAMVIEW or SKYPE with me
